select * from ( select @rowNum := @rowNum + 1 as recNum, t.* from (select (@rowNum := 0)) R, (
select U.*, I.h_name, Y.title, G.room_imageName from u_cart U, h_host I, h_host_info F, h_room Y, h_roomimage G where U.u_id=#{u_id} and F.h_code=U.h_code and F.h_id= I.h_id and Y.room_code = U.room_code and G.room_code = U.room_code and G.room_imageType= 'main_image'
and U.checkIn_date between #{checkIn_date} and #{checkOut_date}
order by creDate desc ) t ) y where recNum between (#{section}-1)*100+ (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum})*10
